name: cheri-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is paralyzed, it consumes this item to cure the paralysis. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures paralysis.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when paralyzed to cure paralysis.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that heals paralysis in battle.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that heals paralysis in battle.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: When held by a POKéMON, it will be used in battle to heal paralysis.
